definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: Meditating without food does not prove that he is reincarnation of Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 能冥想而不禁食不能證明他是達摩轉世。
古埃及人相信轉世重生嗎？

sentences.english: The answer's going to be,yes,because my soul will be reincarnated.
sentences.chinese: 答案將是肯定的，因爲靈魂的轉世。

sentences.english: It is said in Buddhism that one's soul can be reincarnated 49 days after death.
sentences.chinese: 佛教裏說人死七七四十九天後，靈魂就可以轉世了。

sentences.english: Like Tara, she took a vow to always be reborn as a woman.
sentences.chinese: 像度母一樣，她發願常轉世爲女身利益衆生。

sentences.english: Reincarnations of high Tibetan monks are identified through dreams and auspicious signs.
sentences.chinese: 高級喇嘛的轉世由夢和祥符來確定的。

sentences.english: That is exactly what my view of death is without any reincarnation.
sentences.chinese: 依我看來，死了就是死了，並沒有什麼投胎轉世。

sentences.english: My gosh, is my daughter the incarnation of the Budda?
sentences.chinese: 額滴神啊，我養的女兒是佛祖轉世嗎？
轉世輪迴是確有其事還是無稽之談？

sentences.english: Before we discuss the right or wrong, Is there anybody who is interested in discovering the truth of reincarnation?
sentences.chinese: 在討論是是非非之前，有人想知道轉世的真實含義嗎？

sentences.english: Avatar appears with the body, so there must be reincarnated soul boy.
sentences.chinese: 化身隨機體顯現，所以必有靈童轉世。

sentences.english: Suppose that people can be reincarnated.
Kagome is the reincarnation of Kikyo.
The class will be reincarnated yellow bransh boy, black teach is becoming youth.
sentences.chinese: 黃教的班祥會投胎成爲靈童，黑教則轉世爲天童。

sentences.english: Inuyasha and is discovered to be the reincarnation of Kikyo.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏，她解除了犬夜叉的封印，並發現是桔梗轉世。

sentences.english: I have learned that for many of them, the Dalai Lama is the earthly manifestation of the living Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 我得知，對他們許多人來說，達賴喇嘛是活佛轉世。

definition: (of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
to suffer untold hardships (idiom); trials and tribulations/with difficulty/after some effort
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
chance/opportunity/predestined relationship/(Buddhist) principal and secondary causes/chain of cause and effect
(of a spirit or deity) to possess sb
